What is an Evaluation copy?
Evaluation copy is the copy of software which is given by the developer or a company for demo, trial or free version. This is for customer to check software before purchase. 

I had activated this setup in advance means I had already added rarreg.key in the setup.

This is a beta version and it now only available only for trial. Thats why it shows 40 Days Remaining.
